name: Diced Vegetables
description:
Fight through hoards of crows to protect yourself and your vegetables! Diced Vegetables is a top down shooter in which your stats and difficulty are determined by the  roll of a dice, try to survive for as many waves as you can and try to get as high of a score as possible.

This game was made for my first 48 Hour game jam(GMTK 2022), so here are some things I was not able to integrate in time:
Sound

Music

Additional Enemy type that went after dice

Balencing

Made By RyqShaw, twitter: @RyqShaw

Artists:

Beb

galagidae

ThankBlankThought

Lyko

Made in Godot

Additional Art  Assets: https://opengameart.org/content/zelda-like-tilesets-and-sprites

Source Code if you like to look at code that progressively gets worse and worse:

https://github.com/RyqShaw/GMTK2022
